snippet: HAGENDORF--Scott. 1958-2006. Scottie, "HAPPY BIRTHDAY" Baby Brother, Uncle, and Best Friend to Barry, Kathy and your nieces and nephews. Your candles blew out too quickly but your light stays as bright as ever. We miss you every single day and in ...
lead_paragraph: HAGENDORF--Scott. 1958-2006. Scottie, "HAPPY BIRTHDAY" Baby Brother, Uncle, and Best Friend to Barry, Kathy and your nieces and nephews. Your candles blew out too quickly but your light stays as bright as ever. We miss you every single day and in our hearts you will be "FOREVER YOUNG." Sheryl and Sonny 1/3
